SEARCH
Package com.tradingcards.elements.card

Class CardView

java.lang.Object
com.tradingcards.elements.card.CardView
public class CardView extends Object
Provides methods for user interaction related to trading cards, such as creating and viewing card details and collections.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardView

      public CardView()

  • Method Details

    • setCardName

      public String setCardName()
      Prompts the user to input the name of the card.
      Returns:
      the card name entered by the user

    • setCardRarity

      public String setCardRarity()
      Prompts the user to select the rarity of the card from a list of options. Loops until the user enters a valid option (1-4).
      Returns:
      the selected rarity as a string (e.g., "Common", "Uncommon", "Rare", "Legendary")

    • setCardVariant

      public String setCardVariant()
      Prompts the user to select the variant of the card from a list of options. Loops until the user enters a valid option (1-4).
      Returns:
      the selected variant as a string (e.g., "Normal", "Extended-art", "Full-art", "Alt-art")

    • setCardValue

      public double setCardValue()
      Prompts the user to input the base value of the card.
      Returns:
      the base value entered by the user as a double

    • setCardQuantity

      public int setCardQuantity()
      Prompts the user to input the quantity of the card.
      Returns:
      the quantity entered by the user as an int

    • displayCard

      public void displayCard(HashMap<String,CardModel> collection, String cardName)
      Displays detailed information about a specific card from the collection.
      Parameters:
      collection - the HashMap of card name to CardModel
      cardName - the name of the card to display

    • displayCard

      public void displayCard(HashMap<String,CardModel> collection, String cardName, int mode)
      Displays card details (used for decks), omitting quantity.
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection containing the card
      cardName - the name of the card to display
      mode - an unused parameter (used to overload method signature)

    • displayCollection

      public void displayCollection(HashMap<String,CardModel> collection, int mode)
      Displays all cards in the collection with their quantities, regardless of value.
      Parameters:
      collection - the card collection to display
      mode - display mode; mode 0 displays all including zeroes

    • displayCollection

      public void displayCollection(HashMap<String,CardModel> collection)
      Displays all cards in the collection that have a quantity greater than zero.
      Parameters:
      collection - the card collection to display

    • allowIncreaseCardCount

      public boolean allowIncreaseCardCount(String name)
      Prompts the user to confirm whether to increase the card quantity.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the card in question
      Returns:
      true if user selects Y, false if N

    • displayMessageNewLine

      public void displayMessageNewLine(String message)
      Displays a message on a new line.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be printed
